author: Deleted User
content: Anyone know what the origin of using "she" for unknown people in cryptography comes from? I've seen/heard it a few times

author: daniellehrner
content: I don't know the answer, but my guess would be that it refers to Alice. Who is, normally together with Bob, used as placeholder for sender and receiver of cryptographic messages.

author: Deleted User
content: that's my guess too but I've been looking around and can't even find anyone mentioning this little quirk at all
